name: Gatta Cenerentola
summary: Cenerentola struggles to escape the shadow and evil schemes of her stepmother and six stepsisters who all live aboard the Megaride, a ship stuck in the port of a decaying future Naples.
info:
• 中文名: 猫姑娘
